org.eclipse.keyple.distributed

Interface RemoteReaderServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ObservableRemoteReaderServer

    public interface RemoteReaderServer
extends org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader
    API of the Remote Reader Server provided by the Remote Plugin Server.

    This reader behaves like a Reader but exposes additional services.

    Since:
    1.0
